mapper.select: select fpc.partsconfig_id as partsConfigId, fpc.fk_parts_id as partsId, fp.partscode as partsName, fpp.partstypename as partsTypeName, fct.cartypename as carTypeName, fp.networksegmentname as name, fp.phyicalid as phyicalId, fp.functionid as functionId, fp.responseid as responseId, fpc.voltagemodel as voltageModel, fpc.cantype as canType, fpc.travelstate as travelState, fpc.gear as gear, fpc.ordernum as ordernum, fpc.preprogramme as preProgramme, fpc.inprogramme as inProgramme, fpc.safetylevel as safetyLevel, fpc.algorithmmask as algorithmMask, fpc.delay as delay, fpc.isalignment as isAlignment, fpc.alignmentcompany as alignmentCompany, fpc.ecuwaitresettime as ecuWaitResetTime from f_partsconfig fpc left join f_parts fp on fpc.fk_parts_id = fp.parts_id left join f_cartype fct on fp.fk_cartype_id = fct.cartype_id left join f_partstype fpp on fp.fk_partstype_id = fpp.partstype_id WHERE fp.isdelete = 1 and fct.isdelete = 1 and fpp.isdelete = 1 and fpc.fk_parts_id = #{partsId}
mapper.update: update F_PARTSCONFIG set VOLTAGEMODEL = #{voltageModel}, CANTYPE = #{canType}, TRAVELSTATE = #{travelState}, GEAR = #{gear}, ORDERNUM = #{orderNum}, PREPROGRAMME = #{preProgramme}, INPROGRAMME = #{inProgramme}, SAFETYLEVEL = #{safetyLevel}, ALGORITHMMASK = #{algorithmMask}, DELAY = #{delay}, ISALIGNMENT = #{isAlignment}, ALIGNMENTCOMPANY = #{alignmentCompany}, ECUWAITRESETTIME = #{ecuWaitResetTime}, UPDATEBY = #{updateBy}, UPDATEAT = #{updateAt} where replace(fk_parts_id, ' ', '') = #{partsId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
select fct.cartype_id as CarTypeId, fct.cartypename as CarTypeName, fp.parts_id as PartsId, fp.partscode as PartsName, fpc.ordernum as OrderNum from f_cartype fct left join f_parts fp on fct.cartype_id = fp.fk_cartype_id left join f_partsconfig fpc on fp.parts_id=fpc.fk_parts_id
where fct.isdelete=1 and fp.isdelete=1
